translation.en: [announcer] And it's Rockin' With Dewey continuing to race in second.
translation.it: Rockin' With Dewey è ancora in seconda posizione.

translation.en: Then comes Masherhal, Hand Over Bell and Perfect Alliance
translation.it: NETFLIX PRESENTA Poi ci sono Masherhal, Hand Over Bell e Perfect Alliance...

translation.en: is still at the back of the field in 56 and 3/5 seconds.
translation.it: UN FILM ORIGINALE NETFLIX ...è ancora in fondo a 56,6 secondi.

translation.en: And now MF Happenstance leads the charge around the far turn.
translation.it: Ecco MF Happenstance che guida la carica in curva.

translation.en: MF Happenstance, three quarters of a length.
translation.it: MF Happenstance è a tre quarti di lunghezza.

translation.en: Mystery Woman second on the outside,
Rockin' With Dewey is third to the inside.
And they're being followed by Hand Over Bell, Masherhal,
translation.it: Sono seguiti da Hand Over Bell, Masherhal

translation.en: and Perfect Alliance is still at the back.
translation.it: e Perfect Alliance è ancora indietro.

translation.en: And they're into the stretch, three quarters in 1:24.2.
translation.it: Eccoli allo stretch, tre quarti in 1:24.2.

translation.en: And it is still MF Happenstance,
and here comes Mystery Woman to the outside.
-And in the center, Hand Over Bell... -No.
translation.it: - Al centro, Hand Over Bell... - No.

translation.en: Come on.
[announcer] It is Mystery Woman, Hand Over Bell on the far outside.
translation.it: È Mystery Woman, Hand Over Bell ultimo all'esterno.

translation.en: -Masherhal is closing late... -[man] Come on, Mashy.
[announcer] Here at the finish it's Hand Over Bell!
translation.it: Hand Over Bell taglia il traguardo!

translation.en: -[man 2] Yeah, I got it. -Masherhal was next,
then came Rockin' With Dewey and Mystery Woman in 1:51.4.
translation.it: Rockin' With Dewey terzo e Mystery Woman in 1:51.4.

translation.en: I'm starting. No, we wait for him.
Hello?
[computer] You have a collect call from the Atlantic County Correctional Facility
translation.it: Chiamata a carico dal carcere di Atlantic County da parte di...

translation.en: -from... -[recorded voice] Darren.
translation.it: Chiamata a carico dal carcere di Atlantic County da parte di... - Darren. - Prema uno per accettare.

translation.en: [computer] Press one to accept.
-Darren. -Hey.
-Where are you? -Jail.
Jesus. What did you do?
No, it's nothing. I've been trying to call you. You didn't pay your fuckin' cell phone?
translation.it: Non è niente. Ho provato a chiamarti. Non hai pagato il tuo cazzo di cellulare?

translation.en: Yeah, I get paid on Monday. What happened?
translation.it: Verrò pagato lunedì. Che è successo?

translation.en: -I'm down in Atlantic City. -Ma.
Just some asshole, I ended up having to smash in his window.
translation.it: C'era uno stronzo, ho dovuto rompergli il finestrino.

translation.en: Misdemeanor. Point is, I'm stuck here. I gotta spend the night.
translation.it: Un'infrazione. Il punto è che sono bloccato qui. Ci passerò la notte.

translation.en: Which is why I need you to help me out. I got this thing going on here tomorrow...
translation.it: È per questo che devi aiutarmi. Domani ho questa cosa qui...

translation.en: so you gotta do it and pretend you're me.
translation.it: quindi la devi fare tu spacciandoti per me.

translation.en: You'll get in a guy's car and deliver a briefcase.
translation.it: Devi entrare nella macchina di un tipo e ritirare una valigetta.

translation.en: [Darren] Don't worry about anything.
There's $1,500 in it for me. You know I need it.
translation.it: Lì ci sono 1.500 dollari per me. Sai che mi servono.

translation.en: All right? I'll be very proud of you.
translation.it: D'accordo? Sarei molto orgoglioso di te.

translation.en: -What's in the suitcase? -It's a briefcase.
translation.it: - Che c'è nella valigia? - È una valigetta.

translation.en: What's in the briefcase? I don't know.
translation.it: - Che c'è nella valigetta? - Non lo so.

translation.en: No, I'm not doing-- You don't know?
translation.it: No, non farò... Non lo sai?

translation.en: It's just papers, man. It's nothing major.
translation.it: È solo carta, niente di più.

translation.en: I'm not doing that.
-Put Ma on the phone. -No.
-Put Ma on the phone. -[Ola speaking in Polish]
-[banging on door] -[conductor] Miss, I already told you, if you don't have a ticket you'll have to get off the train.
translation.it: Signorina, gliel'ho già detto, se non ha un biglietto, deve scendere dal treno.

translation.en: Your brother needs you. You're doing it.
translation.it: Tuo fratello ha bisogno di te, lo farai.

translation.en: [Darren] Okay, look, just listen, all right?
There'll be a woman on a bench with a green purse.
translation.it: Su una panchina ci sarà una donna con una borsa verde.

translation.en: And you swap your briefcase for hers.
translation.it: Devi scambiare la valigetta con lei.

translation.en: -[Danny] Green purse. -You're not writing this down, are you?
translation.it: - Borsa verde. - Non lo stai scrivendo, vero?

translation.en: Good. Don't be stupid, I really need this money.
translation.it: Bene. Non essere stupido, ho davvero bisogno di quei soldi.

translation.en: I owe you one, all right?
I'll pay your cell phone bill.
translation.it: Ti pagherò il conto del cellulare.

translation.en: All right? She's got a green pocketbook and--
translation.it: D'accordo? Ha un portafoglio verde e...

translation.en: All right, but whose-- whose car am I getting into?
translation.it: Va bene, ma nella macchina di chi devo entrare?

translation.en: -What? -Wrap it up.
Just one sec. You just got to do this for me, okay?
translation.it: Un attimo. Fai questa cosa per me, ok?

translation.en: I'm gonna do it. Who's the guy driving the car?
translation.it: Lo farò, ma chi è il tizio che guida?

translation.en: Promise me you'll do this. Danny? Promise me you'll do--
translation.it: Promettimi che lo farai. Danny, promettimi che lo...

translation.en: I'm doing it, but who's the guy driving the car?
translation.it: Lo farò, ma chi è il tizio che guida?

translation.en: You got a swipe? You got a swipe?
[man] There's this one guy, like, from Philly, I think.
translation.it: C'è questo tizio, di Filadelfia, credo.

translation.en: They got like a Philly vibe, and, uh...
translation.it: Quelli di Filadelfia li riconosci subito.

translation.en: Russell and Jimmy know him.
Russell's been a big pain in the ass, but Jimmy gets it, you know?
translation.it: Russell ci ha dato qualche grana, ma Jimmy è ok.

translation.en: Like, he knows I can come through for him.
translation.it: Sa che farei di tutto per lui.

translation.en: Shit's been weird since the bust, but this is a good situation
translation.it: Le cose sono andate un po' da schifo, ma questa è una buona situazione,

translation.en: 'cause these guys, they're professional.
Not like Howie, that fuck. That guy doesn't know what he's doing.
translation.it: Non come Howie, quel coglione. Quello non sa cosa fa.

translation.en: And the plan is intricate, you know what I mean? It's like a clock, you know.
translation.it: Il piano è complesso, capisci? È come un orologio.

translation.en: Everything fits together and everyone gets protected.
translation.it: Tutto si incastra insieme e tutti sono protetti.

translation.en: I want more money.
-No. -I'm driving.
I'm keeping the clock running.
What are you talking about? You came to me for work.
translation.it: Di che stai parlando? Sei venuta da me per lavorare.

translation.en: I mean, how'd you lose that job anyway?
translation.it: In fondo, come potresti perdere il lavoro?

translation.en: Creative differences.
[chuckles] Really?
And how's, uh, Ricky's check cashing con paying off for you?
translation.it: E come ti ripaga l'incasso di Ricky?

translation.en: Because no one asked you to skip town to Pittsburgh
translation.it: Perché nessuno ti ha chiesto di cambiare città da Pittsburgh

translation.en: for some greaseball shithead.
Yeah, well, he did.
I mean, if you don't go back to Pittsburgh,
translation.it: Insomma, se non torni a Pittsburgh, io ho...

translation.en: I have a... queen size bed.
translation.it: Insomma, se non torni a Pittsburgh, io ho... un letto matrimoniale.

translation.en: You've done worse.
Well, I'm going back to Pittsburgh, so I'm fine on the couch, Scott.
translation.it: Beh, tornerò a Pittsburgh, quindi sto bene sul divano, Scott.

translation.en: Just do the job.
This is the phone. Don't make any outgoing calls.
translation.it: Questo è il telefono. Non fare chiamate.

translation.en: And these are the keys to the Sentra.
translation.it: E queste sono le chiavi della Sentra.

translation.en: -Thought you said it was an Altima. -It's a fuckin' Nissan. Doesn't matter.
translation.it: - Pensavo avessi detto fosse un'Altima. - È una fottuta Nissan. Non importa.

translation.en: It's, like, uh, gonna be the only red Nissan on the block.
translation.it: Sarà l'unica Nissan rossa sul posto.

translation.en: -What's in the briefcase? -I don't know.
translation.it: - Cosa c'è nella valigetta? - Non lo so.

translation.en: You can't know everything, Ellie. Sometimes you gotta just do it.
translation.it: Non puoi sapere tutto, Ellie. A volte, devi farlo e basta.

translation.en: Here you go.
Felicia, I can go?
Are you the guy?
You the guy? Yeah, I'm the girl.
translation.it: - E tu sei il tizio? - Sì, sono la ragazza.

translation.en: Right.
I can see that.
Get in.
Do you know what the-- the-- the guy looks like?
translation.it: Tu sai com'è fatto il tizio?

translation.en: It is a guy, right?
Keep the car on. Roll this back window down.
translation.it: Tieni la macchina accesa. Abbassa il finestrino posteriore.

translation.en: -[man shouting in distance] -He's coming back, he's coming back.
-Do you think they got the license plate? -I don't know.
translation.it: - Pensi che abbiano preso la targa? - Non lo so.

translation.en: Because, man...
Do you know who the girl is I gotta meet with the green bag?
translation.it: Sai chi è la ragazza con la borsa verde che devo incontrare?

translation.en: -Good luck. -All right.
Come on, man.
Yeah, it's done.
Oh, my God-- Oh, my God, it's you.
You don't even know what I just did.
translation.it: Non puoi immaginare cos'ho appena fatto.

translation.en: Look, stop. Where are you goin'?
Look-- Don't run, don't run, don't run, please don't run.
translation.it: Aspetta, dove stai andando? Aspetta... Non correre, per favore. Non correre.

translation.en: I just need a number or something, I just need...
translation.it: Mi serve un numero, qualcosa, mi serve...

translation.en: I don't know, an address or something, like...
translation.it: Non lo so, un indirizzo o qualcos'altro.

translation.en: You're not gonna help me?
I just gave the briefcase to the wrong woman.
translation.it: Ho dato la valigetta alla donna sbagliata.

translation.en: Exactly. What are we gonna do?
What am I gonna do? I'm not supposed to be here.
translation.it: Che cosa faccio? Non dovrei neanche essere qui.

translation.en: I'm not even supposed to be here, it's my brother.
translation.it: Non dovrei essere qui, è di mio fratello.

translation.en: -Do you know my brother Darren? -Don't fucking tell me his name.
translation.it: - Conosci mio fratello Darren? - Non dirmi il suo nome.

translation.en: Why don't you wanna know?
Look, look! Look, you're not gonna get your 1,500 either, okay?
translation.it: Ehi, ascolta! Neanche tu avrai i tuoi 1.500.

translation.en: -1,500? -Yeah, 1,500. That's all I know.
translation.it: - 1.500? - Sì, 1.500. È tutto ciò che so.

translation.en: -All I know is the green-- -They're paying you fuckin' $1,500?
translation.it: - So solo che la cosa verde... - Ti pagano 1.500 dollari?

translation.en: I think so. I don't even know.
Give me your phone. Give me your fucking phone.
translation.it: Dammi il tuo telefono. Dammi il tuo cazzo di telefono.

translation.en: I don't have a-- I didn't pay my bill. What are we gonna do?
translation.it: Non ce l'ho, non ho pagato il conto. E ora che facciamo?

translation.en: You got a quarter?
I got a phone card. You gonna call him? You're calling him?
translation.it: Ho una tessera telefonica. Lo chiami? Lo stai chiamando?

translation.en: -Fuck. -This is not fucking rocket science.
translation.it: - Cazzo! - Questa non è ingegneria aerospaziale.

translation.en: How hard is it? You walk up to the fucking platform, -you exchange the suitcase. -I know.
translation.it: Quanto è difficile? Sali sulla fottuta piattaforma e scambi la valigetta.

translation.en: I got an eight-year-old that can do it.
translation.it: - Lo so... - Un bambino di otto anni riesce a farlo.

translation.en: You give it to this fuckin' Pollack, look what happens.
translation.it: L'avete data a questo cazzo di Pollack ed ecco cos'è successo.

translation.en: -You're so fucking stupid-- -Stop talking, Russell! -Stop talking! -[cell phone ringing]
translation.it: - Siete così stupidi. - Smettila di parlare, Russell! Smettila!

translation.en: Hold up. Who's this?
-Well, hello there. -[man] I think we got a problem.
translation.it: - Ma ciao. - Credo che abbiamo un problema.

translation.en: Yeah, no shit. $1,500, Scott?
translation.it: Ma non mi dire! 1.500 dollari, Scott?

translation.en: Why is some idiot getting twice as much as me?
translation.it: Perché questo idiota prende il doppio di me?

translation.en: -[Scott] He with you now? -Yes.
Do you have the thing?
But I have the address where it's going.
translation.it: Ma ho l'indirizzo a cui sta andando.

translation.en: I think we got it under control, okay? Just gonna take a little longer.
translation.it: Ho tutto sotto controllo, ok? Ci vorrà solo un po' di più.

translation.en: It's fine. We got it under control.
translation.it: A posto. È tutto sotto controllo.

translation.en: It's gonna cost you.
[Scott] Okay. The full $1,500.
Twice that.
What the fuck do I care? It's comin' out of your share.
translation.it: Che mi importa? Li prendiamo dalla tua parte.

translation.en: -Okay. -We need to see Darren, too.
And she brings Darren. I don't want him running around until this is done.
translation.it: Dille di portare Darren. Non voglio che se ne vada in giro finché non è finita.

translation.en: Okay, so you deliver the thing and you bring him with you tonight.
translation.it: Ok, consegnerai la cosa e porta lui con te stasera.

translation.en: You can keep his share, too.
translation.it: Puoi tenere anche la sua parte.

translation.en: Okay. All right.
New Ebony Hotel, Room 1310, 10:00 p.m.
1310, got it. Let's go. Wait, wait, you don't need me. You-- You got the address.
translation.it: - 1310, ricevuto. Andiamo. - Aspetta, non ti servo. Hai l'indirizzo.

translation.en: Take the bag, I don't want it anymore.
translation.it: Prendi la borsa, non la voglio più.

translation.en: What does the woman look like? She's got blonde hair, she had a white shirt on.
translation.it: - Com'è fatta la donna? - È bionda e indossa una maglietta bianca.

translation.en: -She's... -Yeah, exactly. Let's go.
[Ellie] What's the address on the pills again?
-[pills rattling] -31 Maryasis Road. It's in Briarcliff.
[Ellie] Hi, what train goes to Briarcliff?
translation.it: Salve, quale treno va a Briarcliff?

translation.en: Ossining or Scarborough, whichever one is closer to you.
translation.it: Ossining o Scarborough, quello che vi è più comodo.

translation.en: -Scarborough. -12:20, track 40.
Okay. Thank you.
You want to guess what my name is?
My name is Danny.
-Come on, tell me your name. -[scoffs] I'm not telling you my name.
translation.it: - Dai, dimmi come ti chiami. - Non te lo dirò.

translation.en: All right. Where are you from?
Look, you fucked up, so you lost "knowing shit" privileges, all right?
translation.it: Senti, hai fatto un casino, quindi hai perso il privilegio di sapere.

translation.en: -You know, you can be a real-- -A what? Huh?
translation.it: - Tu sai essere proprio una... - Una cosa?

translation.en: -A real bitch? -What?
I was-- I was gonna say you can be a tough nut to crack, but...
translation.it: Stavo per dire che hai un guscio difficile da rompere, ma...

translation.en: Were you really gonna say "a tough nut to crack"?
translation.it: Stavi per dire davvero "un guscio difficile da rompere"?

translation.en: Yeah. Why, what's wrong with that?
translation.it: Sì. Perché, che c'è che non va?

translation.en: I live in Pittsburgh.
How's Pittsburgh?
A lot of shitty people.
translation.it: C'è un sacco di brutta gente.

translation.en: Oh. I'm sorry.
Don't be sorry. You didn't build it.
translation.it: Non essere dispiaciuto, non l'hai costruita tu.

translation.en: So, you live with anyone in Pittsburgh?
You know, you got a roommate or, you know, you got a boyfriend?
translation.it: Hai un coinquilino o un ragazzo?

translation.en: I live with a Ricky.
What's a Ricky?
I had a lizard named Ricky once.
translation.it: Una volta avevo una lucertola di nome Ricky.

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds about right.
translation.it: Una volta avevo una lucertola di nome Ricky. Ci può stare.

translation.en: Come on, you'll be done when it's done.
translation.it: Vieni, te ne andrai quando avremo finito.

translation.en: Who do you think lives out here? Rich people.
translation.it: - Secondo te, chi vive da queste parti? - Gente ricca.

translation.en: So, how much do you think these houses cost?
translation.it: E quanto credi che costino queste case?

translation.en: -Why? You in the market? -Oh, no.
What about, uh, Sacramento? You ever been there?
translation.it: Che mi dici di Sacramento? Ci sei mai stata?

translation.en: No, thank God.
There's a job opening there.
'Cause I'm a chef, you know? At a nice restaurant in the city.
translation.it: Perché io sono uno chef, sai? In un bel ristorante in città.

translation.en: You know what "farm to table" is, right?
translation.it: Sai cosa significa "dall'orto alla tavola", vero?

translation.en: I'm more of a cook, I guess.
Okay, sure, whatever, but you don't have to leave New York.
translation.it: Sì, quello che vuoi, ma non devi andartene da New York.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but...
my living situation's not great.
translation.it: La mia situazione economica non è un granché.

translation.en: Fine, but there's restaurants everywhere.
translation.it: Va bene, ma ci sono ristoranti ovunque.

translation.en: That's true.
So what about you? What do you do?
translation.it: Che mi dici di te? Che cosa fai?

translation.en: -I'm recently unemployed. -Oh, really? What did you do?
translation.it: - Attualmente, sono disoccupata. - Davvero? Che cosa facevi?

translation.en: I-- I was a bartender.
But I made-- I made, like, fancy cocktails.
That's cool. I got this friend Lev that I went to high school with,
translation.it: Bello. Ho un amico, Lev, che conosco dai tempi della scuola.

translation.en: he-- he's a bar-back in the city at this bar and he's just like...
translation.it: Lavora in un bar in città ed è...

translation.en: His favorite drink to make is, like, these egg whites--
translation.it: Il suo drink migliore è con gli albumi d'uovo...

translation.en: Look, I wasn't a bartender, okay? I worked in a strip club.
translation.it: Ascolta, non ero una barista, lavoravo in uno strip club, ok?

translation.en: I bet you were successful at that, you know.
-What the fuck's that supposed to mean? -Nothing, just 'cause--
translation.it: - Che cazzo vorrebbe dire? - Niente, solo perché...

translation.en: You're pretty and you're smart, and...
Well, I wasn't.
And I was only a waitress, okay? I didn't strip or work the back.
translation.it: Ero solo una cameriera, ok? Non mi spogliavo.

translation.en: -All right. -I'm serious. I don't sleep around.
translation.it: - Ho capito. - Sono seria, non vado a letto con tutti.

translation.en: -What, you don't believe me? -I believe you.
translation.it: - Che c'è, non mi credi? - Ti credo.

translation.en: -Guess how many guys I've slept with. -It doesn't matter--
translation.it: - Indovina con quanti ragazzi sono stata. - Non importa...

translation.en: -No, no. Guess. -I'm not guessing, that's stupid.
translation.it: - No, indovina. - Non voglio indovinare, è stupido.

translation.en: -I'm not gonna guess. -Seven.
-Okay. -It's not a lot.
It's not a lot. I probably would've said higher.
translation.it: Non sono molti. Forse avrei detto di più.

translation.en: Oh, so you're saying I look like a whore now?
translation.it: Quindi stai dicendo che sembro una troia?

translation.en: No! I just...
I just-- I wouldn't even think you were a whore
translation.it: No, dicevo solo... Non penserei che sei una troia neanche se fossi andata a letto con 100 uomini.

translation.en: if you slept with, like, a hundred guys.
translation.it: Non penserei che sei una troia neanche se fossi andata a letto con 100 uomini.

translation.en: Yeah, exactly.
-Who are you to judge me? -I'm not judging you.
translation.it: - Chi sei tu per giudicarmi? - Non ti sto giudicando.

translation.en: That's why I don't wanna guess.
translation.it: È per questo che non voglio indovinare.

translation.en: We're lost.
-Uh, we shouldn't be. -No, I've seen that house before.
translation.it: - Non è possibile. - No, ho già visto quella casa.

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe you were here when you were a kid.
translation.it: Non so, magari... sei stata qui da bambina.

translation.en: You know, if that was the right left, then this is Maryasis.
translation.it: Se quella era la svolta giusta, allora questa è Maryasis.

translation.en: If they put up a fuckin' street sign we'd be able to tell.
translation.it: Se ci fosse un cartello del cazzo, lo sapremmo.

translation.en: -Hey, what are you doing? -Looking for an address.
translation.it: - Che stai facendo? - Cerco un indirizzo.

translation.en: No, no, you can't do this, it's a federal crime.
translation.it: No, non puoi farlo, è un crimine federale.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I got an accomplice. Look, it is the right street.
translation.it: Beh, ho un complice. Guarda, è la via giusta.

translation.en: Put it away.
Can I help you?
-Hey. Um, do you live here? -I do not.
-Neither do we. -No.
You don't look much like the Kutikoffs.
The Kutiko-- Yeah, uh-- We're supposed to just, you know...
translation.it: I Kuti... Sì, noi dovremmo, ecco...

translation.en: -They're-- We're just... -We're just a little lost.
-We're just a little lost. -That's it.
You know what I do when I'm lost?
translation.it: Sapete cosa faccio quando mi perdo?

translation.en: I call the police. Shall I call them for you?
translation.it: Chiamo la polizia. Volete che la chiami per voi?

translation.en: -No, no. -No, thanks. We're just gonna leave.
translation.it: - No, grazie, ora ce ne andiamo. - Grazie.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[man] Good idea.
translation.it: - No, grazie, ora ce ne andiamo. - Grazie. Buona idea.

translation.en: Sorry. Don't worry about it. He's driving a fucking SUV.
translation.it: - Scusa. - Non preoccuparti, guida un cazzo di SUV.

translation.en: -What does that mean? -He's an asshole.
translation.it: - Che cosa significa? - Che è un coglione.

translation.en: I don't think anyone's home.
Hey. It's in the living room. Don't let the dog out.
translation.it: Ehi. È in soggiorno, non fate uscire il cane.

translation.en: -Is that the girl that took the bag? -No, no. This girl is younger.
translation.it: - È la ragazza che ha preso la borsa? - No, questa è più giovane.

translation.en: Uh, I guess.
I don't think she's talking about the briefcase.
I think we just have to find her and ask her.
translation.it: Credo che dovremmo trovarla e chiederglielo.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, let's do that.
Hello?
Hello?
Hey, look, it's a Ricky.
Oh, my God, check it out.
That's a big lizard.
I don't know why they give kids pets that die so young.
translation.it: Non capisco perché diano ai bambini animali che muoiono così presto.

translation.en: Maybe let 'em be sad about something small before the really sad things happen.
translation.it: Forse per farli essere tristi per qualcosa di piccolo prima che provino qualcosa di davvero triste.

translation.en: Come on.
And, you know, lizards have a really long lifespan. Like, 20 years.
translation.it: E poi le lucertole hanno una lunga aspettativa di vita. Circa 20 anni.

translation.en: So what happened to Ricky?
Uh, well, his living situation wasn't exactly ideal either.
translation.it: Beh... neanche lui aveva una situazione esattamente ideale.

translation.en: -Ya know. -Whose is?
These guys'.
-Yeah. -[Danny] Hello.
Hello?
[Ellie] Hello?
-Where is she? -Yeah, and where's the dog?
translation.it: - Ma dov'è? - Già, e dov'è il cane?

translation.en: Hey, look, someone's coming home.
I think that-- That's the guy with the SUV.
translation.it: Credo che... È il tizio con il SUV.

translation.en: What?
Hide. Hide.
What are you doing? Come on.
-[whispers] We gotta jump. -What?
[whispers] We gotta jump.
[softly] We got this, okay?
Fuck.
[mouthing] Come on. Jump!
Come on.
We didn't let the dog out.
translation.it: Non abbiamo fatto uscire il cane.

translation.en: You know what? Look, I'm going back up there.
translation.it: Sai una cosa? Io torno lì.

translation.en: I'm going back up there.
I'm going to explain to them. Take my ID.
translation.it: Gli spiego tutto. Prendi la mia carta d'identità.

translation.en: If I get arrested I'm gonna give a false name.
translation.it: Se vengo arrestato, do un nome falso.

translation.en: The name isn't the problem, you've been seen by half the family.
translation.it: Il problema non è il nome. Metà della famiglia ti ha visto.

translation.en: Let's just wait till they go in the morning.
translation.it: Aspettiamo che se ne vadano domattina.

translation.en: The wife will probably leave the briefcase inside, we'll go in and get it.
translation.it: La moglie lascerà la valigetta dentro e noi andremo a prenderla.

translation.en: -And what if it's not there? -Then we'll leave, all right?
translation.it: - E se non ci fosse? - Allora ce ne andremo, va bene?

translation.en: We just got to wait and see.
Look, I'm sorry, all right? I screwed up.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ok? Ho fatto un bel casino.

translation.en: It's my fault. I'm gonna forfeit my share, okay?
translation.it: È colpa mia. Rinuncerò alla mia parte, ok?

translation.en: -But I can't stay here the whole night. -No, you have to.
translation.it: - Ma non posso stare qui tutta la notte. - No, devi.

translation.en: Why? Why? And honestly, you should come with me.
translation.it: Perché? E, onestamente, tu dovresti venire con me.

translation.en: We should let them deal with this.
translation.it: Dovremmo lasciare che se la sbrighino loro.

translation.en: This is-- This is their problem. This has nothing to do with us.
translation.it: Questo è un loro problema, noi non c'entriamo niente.

translation.en: Unless you know how someone who's broke can make enough money
translation.it: A meno che tu non sappia come fare soldi per uscire da una situazione di merda,

translation.en: to get out of a shitty situation, then it's worth it to me.
translation.it: A meno che tu non sappia come fare soldi per uscire da una situazione di merda, per me ne vale la pena.

translation.en: Are you using the money to get away from that guy?
translation.it: Userai i soldi per fuggire da quel tipo?

translation.en: Yes, okay?
I'm using the money to leave Pittsburgh.
translation.it: Userò i soldi per andarmene da Pittsburgh.

translation.en: good job back there.
You know, from not letting the dog out and stuff.
translation.it: Sei stato bravo, prima. Sai, non hai fatto scappare il cane...

translation.en: -You gonna order something? -Yeah, sure.
Um, what can we get for nine dollars?
translation.it: Cosa posso prendere con nove dollari?

translation.en: Is that including tip?
Sure.
Can I use your phone?
-You have reached the voice mailbox of... -Scott.
translation.it: - Questa è la segreteria di... - Scott.

translation.en: -Please leave a message after the tone. -[beep]
translation.it: Lasciate un messaggio dopo il segnale acustico.

translation.en: Hey, it's me.
We're fine, we're on it but we got delayed.
translation.it: Stiamo bene, ci stiamo lavorando, ma siamo un po' in ritardo.

translation.en: So it won't be going down till tomorrow.
translation.it: Stiamo bene, ci stiamo lavorando, ma siamo un po' in ritardo. Non ce la faremo prima di domani.

translation.en: So, yeah, we'll be at the motel in the morning.
-[Danny] So what'd he say? -Couldn't reach him.
translation.it: - Che cosa ha detto? - Non c'era.

translation.en: All right, look, let's get some food.
You need food? I need food, I'm starving.
translation.it: Hai fame? Io sto morendo di fame.

translation.en: -Yeah? -All right, yeah.
Kids' menu or appetizers?
[Ellie] So what about you? You got a roommate, girlfriend?
translation.it: Che mi dici di te? Hai una coinquilina, una ragazza?

translation.en: [Danny] Well, I was-- I was seeing this girl in my building last year.
translation.it: Che mi dici di te? Hai una coinquilina, una ragazza? L'anno scorso frequentavo una ragazza del mio palazzo.

translation.en: [Ellie] Oh, really? With that little hair thing above your lip?
translation.it: Davvero? Con quei due peli sul labbro?

translation.en: What's wrong with my mustache?
translation.it: Cos'hanno che non va i miei baffi?

translation.en: All right, who else?
[Danny] I don't wanna talk about this with you. [Ellie] Come on, give me something.
translation.it: - Non voglio parlarne con te. - Avanti, dimmi qualcosa.

translation.en: Very bad for Darren?
Ma, it could be very bad for me.
translation.it: Mamma, può andar male per me.

translation.en: [Ellie] What about high school?
Some scandalous hallway hookups? Some stairway action?
translation.it: Incontri scandalosi nei corridoi? Molta azione sulle scale?

translation.en: All right.
Rebecca Vargas. She touched my penis in tenth grade.
translation.it: Rebecca Vargas. Mi ha toccato il pene in secondo liceo.

translation.en: -Wow. Rebecca Vargas? -Yeah, Rebecca Vargas.
translation.it: - Wow, Rebecca Vargas? - Già, Rebecca Vargas.

translation.en: Rebecca Vargas back then... Oh, my God, man.
translation.it: Sto parlando di Rebecca Vargas... Oh, mio Dio.

translation.en: Ohh. I don't know if it counts, though.
-[Ellie] Why wouldn't it count? -Well...
All right. Mike Budabin, a friend of mine,
translation.it: D'accordo. Mike Budabin, un mio amico,

translation.en: he told everyone that whoever got Rebecca Vargas
translation.it: disse a tutti che chiunque avesse convinto Rebecca Vargas

translation.en: to touch their penis first, wins the "Special Prize."
translation.it: a toccargli il pene per primo, avrebbe vinto un premio speciale.

translation.en: [Ellie] What was the Special Prize?
It was having Rebecca Vargas touch your penis.
translation.it: Farti toccare il pene da Rebecca Vargas.

translation.en: -Makes sense. -Right.
Anyway, she found out about this prize being associated with her
translation.it: Comunque, scoprì del premio associato a lei

translation.en: and she wanted to know what it was.
translation.it: e volle sapere di che si trattava.

translation.en: And so she asked me, and I said that I would tell her, but...
translation.it: Così me lo chiese e io le dissi che gliel'avrei detto, ma...

translation.en: she had to touch my penis first.
translation.it: che prima doveva toccarmi il pene.

translation.en: So she tapped it with her pinky and...
translation.it: Così lo toccò con il mignolo e...

translation.en: that's how I won the Special Prize.
[Ola, in Polish] Daniel, just come home now.
You'll make supper, and the bettors are coming early tomorrow.
translation.it: Così prepari la cena, gli scommettitori arrivano domattina presto.

translation.en: We should just let Darren handle it.
Yeah.
I'm gonna stay.
Daniel? Daniel? Hello?
Thank you.
[Ellie] I don't know if that's the sweetest or saddest story I've ever heard in my life.
translation.it: Non so se questa sia la storia più dolce o più triste che abbia mai sentito.

translation.en: No, no, no, it's the sweetest. It's the sweetest.
For the record, it counts.
-Really? -Yeah, of course.
I mean, she touched your penis, right?
translation.it: Ti ha toccato il pene, no?

translation.en: [Danny] You don't think that we should just sleep in the woods?
translation.it: Non credi che dovremmo dormire nel bosco?

translation.en: [Ellie scoffs] I am not sleeping in the woods.
-What if this is alarmed? -The pool shed?
translation.it: - E se ci fosse l'allarme? - Nel capanno della piscina?

translation.en: -I don't know. -Don't worry. It's not alarmed.
translation.it: - Non lo so. - Non preoccuparti, non c'è l'allarme.

translation.en: Just come on. Live a little.
[Danny] So he ends up going to court and he was in the courtroom going "It was a ghost."
translation.it: Quindi alla fine finisce in tribunale e lì dice: "È stato un fantasma".

translation.en: And the judge is like, "I know the ghost. I've seen it."
translation.it: E il giudice: "Conosco il fantasma, l'ho visto".

translation.en: So he got off.
So, what do you cook?
Everything.
-I mean, at the restaurant. -Oh. Um...
It's, uh, it's a nice little Italian place.
You ever been there? To Italy?
translation.it: Ci sei mai stato? In Italia.

translation.en: I mean, the only place I've ever been is Providence.
translation.it: L'unico posto in cui sono mai stato è Providence.

translation.en: Well, that's where you should go. Forget Sacramento.
translation.it: Beh, allora dovresti andare lì. Dimentica Sacramento.

translation.en: I've been there once.
translation.it: Io ci sono stata una volta.

translation.en: -[Danny] You have? -To Italy, yeah.
Wow. Did you go with your family or something?
translation.it: Ci sei stata con la famiglia?

translation.en: -I'm sorry, I didn't... -Don't be sorry.
translation.it: - Mi dispiace, non volevo... - Non dispiacerti.

translation.en: Do you like it there?
Yeah, I guess.
Italy has a lot of shady people once you get past all the tourist stuff.
translation.it: In Italia ci sono molte persone ambigue, una volta passata la roba turistica.

translation.en: Right.
You don't ever think that maybe it's-- it's not the place that's shady,
translation.it: Non hai mai pensato che magari non è il posto ad essere ambiguo,

translation.en: it's the people you're choosing to hang out with.
translation.it: ma le persone che scegli di frequentare?

translation.en: You know, why don't you go somewhere else besides Providence for the weekend
translation.it: Perché non vai da qualche altra parte, oltre a Providence per il weekend,

translation.en: before you start acting like you know everything.
translation.it: prima di comportarti come se sapessi tutto?

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -No, it's-- No, no, it's okay.
I'm just cold.
You know, if-- if you are cold, we could-- we could hold each other.
Excuse me?
You know, we could hold each other for warmth.
You wanna cuddle me?
Look, it's a meteorical fact. I'm not, you know.
Meteorological.
That's what I meant.
If you try anything, I swear to God you're gonna fuckin' regret it.
translation.it: Se fai qualcosa, giuro su Dio che te ne pentirai.

translation.en: No, I'm-- I'm a little scared of you, so I'm not...
translation.it: No, ho un po' paura di te, quindi non farò nulla.

translation.en: We're only cuddling for warmth.
Yeah. Cuddling for weather purposes.
translation.it: Sì, ci coccoliamo per scopi meteorologici.

translation.en: [Ellie] Hey, it's me. We're fine. We're on it, but we got delayed.
translation.it: Ehi, sono io. Stiamo bene, ci stiamo lavorando, ma siamo un po' in ritardo.

translation.en: So it won't be going down till tomorrow.
translation.it: Non ce la faremo prima di domani.

translation.en: So, yeah. We'll be at the motel in the morning.
So that was Ellie. And it's fine, you know.
Uh, they're a little delayed, but they'll be there in the morning, so...
translation.it: Sono un po' in ritardo, ma saranno lì domattina, quindi...

translation.en: Just drop me off at the motel and it's all good.
translation.it: Lasciami al motel e andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: What exactly is good about that?
translation.it: Cosa va bene in tutto ciò?

translation.en: It's, uh-- You know, she has it.
-She said that? -[Scott] Yeah.
Let me hear the message.
I deleted it.
She'll be there. I mean, she needs the money.
I mean-- and she's gotta bring him too, or else she won't get his share, so... You know, it'll work out.
translation.it: E porterà anche lui, altrimenti non avrà la sua parte. Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: -Like it worked out in Camden? -That was three years ago, Jimmy.
translation.it: - Come andò tutto bene a Camden? - Sono passati tre anni, Jimmy.

translation.en: Come on, man. [stammers]
Move on.
Yeah, maybe for you and me moving on is a good idea.
translation.it: Sì, forse per noi andare avanti è una buona idea.

translation.en: -That-- That's not what I mean. -[cell phone vibrating]
It's Darren. Darren, where are you, man?
[Darren] Hey, man, I'm-- I'm running a little late. I'm at my mom's house.
translation.it: Ehi, farò un po' tardi, sono a casa di mia madre.

translation.en: What do you mean you're at your mom's house?
translation.it: Che significa che sei a casa di tua madre?

translation.en: [Darren] I, uh, got a little delayed. I'll be at-- I'll be at the motel soon.
translation.it: Sono un po' in ritardo. Sarò al motel presto.

translation.en: Well, then, who the fuck is with Ellie?
translation.it: Allora chi cazzo c'è con Ellie?

translation.en: [Ellie] All right, here they come.
Whoa. She's clearly running the family.
translation.it: È chiaramente lei il capo della famiglia.

translation.en: [Danny] Yeah, he looks like he'd be lost without her.
translation.it: Sì, lui sembra perso senza di lei.

translation.en: [Ellie] And you know what he does when he's lost.
translation.it: E tu sai cosa fa quando si perde.

translation.en: [both, in unison] Calls the police.
translation.it: - Chiama la polizia. - Chiama la polizia.

translation.en: [Ellie] All right, hopefully she left the briefcase inside.
translation.it: Bene, spero che abbia lasciato la valigetta dentro.

translation.en: [Danny] Oh, no, no, no, no. That's not the woman with the green bag.
translation.it: Oh, no, non è la donna con la borsa verde.

translation.en: [Ellie] What do you mean? [Danny] She was like, I don't know, 30 years younger.
translation.it: - Che vuoi dire? - Lei aveva... 30 anni in meno.

translation.en: -Are you sure? -Yeah.
Shit.
-[Danny] What if she locked it? -You just saw her not lock the door.
translation.it: - E se ha chiuso a chiave? - Hai appena visto che non l'ha fatto.

translation.en: The whole point of living out here is so they don't have to worry about people like us.
translation.it: Il punto di vivere qui è che non ci si deve preoccupare di gente come noi.

translation.en: All right, all right.
-Hey! -Take it.
-Hey, is this her? -Yeah, that's her.
translation.it: - Ehi, è lei? - Sì, è lei.

translation.en: -I guess it's the daughter. -But she had the pills.
translation.it: - Penso sia la figlia. - Ma aveva le pillole.

translation.en: I don't know, they must be her mom's.
Come on.
There's a computer. Boom. All right.
So, I just put their last name into their email and-- and something should come up.
translation.it: Inserisco il loro cognome nella e-mail e dovrebbe venire fuori qualcosa.

translation.en: Wait, how do I spell it?
- W-E-I-R-E-- - I-R... Wierengo. I got it.
All right.
We got Dave Wierengo, we got Eric Wierengo.
Vinessa Wierengo, with an "I" in the Vinessa.
- Where? - After the "V."
"Hey, Mom, do you remember the name of the hotel?"
translation.it: "Ehi, mamma, ti ricordi il nome dell'albergo?"

translation.en: Blah-blah-blah, blah-blah-blah... All right!
-What? -We got it.
"Vinessa Wierengo, Marketing Coordinator. Annabella Advisors, 242 West 30th Street."
translation.it: "Vinessa Wierengo, Coordinatrice Marketing. Annabella Advisors, 242 Ovest 30esima Strada."

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Yes! All right!
All right, I'm-- I'm gonna go change.
Why, what? What do you mean change?
Because I feel fuckin' filthy.
Just go grab some food. -All right. Yeah. -Okay?
translation.it: - Vai a cercare del cibo. - Va bene.

translation.en: Let's do it!
Hey, you in there? We should probably get out of here.

translation.en: [Ellie] Yeah. Just a minute.
[Ellie] Hey. Put this on.
Sure.
Come on. Let's go.
So, what do you think?
About what?
About my mustache.
Yeah, I don't know. Maybe you looked better with it.
translation.it: Non lo so, forse stai meglio con i baffi.

translation.en: You look great.
At least better than whatever was going on there before.

translation.en: And I'm sure all the girls in your building will love it.
translation.it: E sono sicura che piacerà a tutte le ragazze del tuo palazzo.

translation.en: I don't want the girls in my building.
translation.it: Non voglio le ragazze del mio palazzo.

translation.en: [Danny] Is my mom there? Or can you put my brother on?
translation.it: C'è mia madre? Puoi passarmi mio fratello?

translation.en: [Jimmy] They're fine. Just give me the address.
[Danny] Vinessa Wierengo, Annabella Advisors.
-242 West 30th Street. -242 West 30th Street. Got it.
translation.it: - 242 Ovest 30esima Strada. - 242 Ovest 30esima Strada. Ho capito.

translation.en: And that's-- that's with an "I" after the "V" in Vinessa. It's not Vanessa.
translation.it: C'è una "I" dopo la "V", è Vinessa. Non è Vanessa.

translation.en: -[Jimmy] Just sit tight. -Okay.
I'll send guys over. If she leaves, stay with her.
translation.it: Mando i ragazzi. Se lei se ne va, seguitela.

translation.en: [Danny] She wants to know about the money.
What about the money?
She'll get what we agreed to.
I want you to go to them, then meet Scott outside the motel.

translation.en: Oh, and Darren, what me and Ellie agreed to...
translation.it: E, Darren, ciò che io e Ellie abbiamo concordato...

translation.en: she's taking your share.
translation.it: è che lei prende la tua parte.

translation.en: I gotta take a shit.
Uh, yeah, Annabella Advisors. Uh, 242 West 30th Street.
[man] Hello. Annabella Advisors.
Could you connect me with, uh, Vinessa Winergo, please?
translation.it: Può passarmi Vinessa Winergo, per favore?

translation.en: -Uh, yes. Wierengo. Please hold. -[line ringing]
Hello, this is Vinessa.
Ms. Wierengo. Hi. Yeah. Um...
I believe you may have a briefcase that belongs to me.
translation.it: Credo che lei abbia una valigetta che appartiene a me.

translation.en: [Vinessa] Oh. Oh, my God, yes. I-- I'm-- I have it right here in my office. Do you have my bag?
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio, sì. Ce l'ho qui in ufficio. Lei ha la mia borsa?

translation.en: Your bag? Yeah, I've got it.
translation.it: La sua borsa? Sì, ce l'ho.

translation.en: Here's the thing, I'm about to walk into a very important meeting right now
translation.it: Ascolti, io ora devo andare a un meeting importante

translation.en: and there are some essential documents in it that I need right now.
translation.it: e lì dentro ci sono dei documenti importanti di cui ho bisogno.

translation.en: [Vinessa] Oh, well, I...
Look, it's a beautiful day outside. Why not get out of the office, right?
translation.it: Fuori è una bella giornata, perché non esce dall'ufficio?

translation.en: [Jimmy] No fucking way, Darren.
I don't care how long it takes, you're not running any errands.
translation.it: Non mi importa quanto ci vorrà, ma tu non avrai più incarichi.

translation.en: Hello?
Sir, uh, we got the briefcase.
-[Jimmy] Really? -Yeah, yeah.
-How? -I-- I don't know.
She walked out of her building and she had the briefcase with her.
translation.it: È uscita dall'edificio con la valigetta.

translation.en: So we decided to follow her, right?
[Jimmy] All right, but I told you to just stay on her.
translation.it: Sì, ma vi avevo detto solo di controllarla.

translation.en: But then we started thinking like...
[Ellie] Where do you think she's going with it?
translation.it: Dove credi che vada con quella?

translation.en: [Danny] I don't know. Do you think she's gonna go to the cops?
translation.it: Non lo so, pensi che stia andando alla polizia?

translation.en: I don't know.
-[Jimmy] Yeah, that makes sense, I guess. -[Danny] Right?
translation.it: - Sì, questo ha senso, credo. - Giusto?

translation.en: So we decided to keep, uh, real close and-- and-- and watch her,
translation.it: Quindi abbiamo deciso di starle vicino e controllarla.

translation.en: and we didn't take our eyes off her one bit.
translation.it: Non le abbiamo mai tolto gli occhi di dosso.

translation.en: [Ellie] She's getting up.
We gotta get that briefcase. I'm wearing her mom's dress.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo prendere quella valigetta. - Indosso un vestito della madre.

translation.en: All right. Let me deal with it, all right?
translation.it: D'accordo, lascia che me ne occupi io, va bene?

translation.en: -Hey. Hey! Hi. -Oh, hey.
Sorry, I don't know if you remember me but I got your bag.
translation.it: Scusi, non so se si ricorda di me, ma ho la sua borsa.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, of course. Hi.
I'm really sorry, I just took it by mistake. It wasn't like--
translation.it: Mi dispiace, l'ho presa per sbaglio, non volevo...

translation.en: No, no, I know. Don't worry. I got it. Here.
translation.it: No, capisco, non si preoccupi. Tenga.

translation.en: Right. Right.
-Thanks. -Thank you! Thank you so much.
I guess I'm gonna head back down here, but thank you.
translation.it: Credo di dover tornare di sotto, grazie ancora.

translation.en: -Good luck with your meeting. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Buona fortuna per il meeting. - Grazie.

translation.en: She just gave-- She just gave it-- -She just gave it to me. -Let's go!
I didn't even say anything to her.
[Danny] We were real smart about it, too, like she didn't suspect a thing at all.
translation.it: Abbiamo pensato che lei non sospettasse proprio niente.

translation.en: [Jimmy] All right. I don't need to hear the whole story. Just meet outside the motel.
translation.it: Ok, non voglio sapere tutta la storia. Incontriamoci fuori dal motel.

translation.en: Okay. Um, sir, can I talk to my brother, please?
translation.it: Ok. Scusi, posso parlare con mio fratello, per favore?

translation.en: They want us to meet at the motel.
-They got the briefcase. -What?
Looks like you're a lucky son of a bitch.
translation.it: Sembra che tu sia un fortunato figlio di puttana.

translation.en: -[Danny] Darren? -Yeah.
We got the briefcase, man. We came through.
translation.it: Abbiamo la valigetta, ce l'abbiamo fatta.

translation.en: Are you there with the girl? Talk in Polish.
translation.it: Sei con la ragazza? Parla in polacco.

translation.en: [Danny, in Polish] Yeah. [in English] Thank fucking God.
[in Polish] Listen, she's screwing us over.
[Danny] What? No, she's not.
She cut a deal with them. She gets my share...
translation.it: Ha un accordo con loro. Avrà la mia parte, se ti tiene a bada finché non è finita.

translation.en: if she babysits you until it's done.
translation.it: Ha un accordo con loro. Avrà la mia parte, se ti tiene a bada finché non è finita. No, lei è davvero gentile.

translation.en: No, no. She's really cool.
[Darren, in English] Listen, Danny, I know you probably like her and all, but think about it.
translation.it: Ascolta, Danny, capisco che probabilmente lei ti piaccia, ma rifletti.

translation.en: I bet she was real insistent on you sticking around the whole time, right?
translation.it: Immagino che lei abbia insistito per rimanere insieme tutto il tempo, vero?

translation.en: Why do you think she would do that?
You there, kid?
[in Polish] Yeah.
[Darren] Look, I'm sorry, Danny.
She's a con artist. Stripper.
[in Polish] Waitress. [Darren, in English] Yeah, whatever, man.
Point is, you're a fucking paycheck to her.
translation.it: Il punto è che tu sei la sua paga.

translation.en: But if you bring the briefcase back, then I can get the whole share and cut her out of it.
translation.it: Ma se riporti la valigetta, posso prendere tutto il denaro e tagliarla fuori.

translation.en: [in Polish] Just get the briefcase and come home.
translation.it: Prendi la valigetta e torna a casa.

translation.en: All right?
[in Polish] Yeah.
[Ellie] You speak Russian? Polish.
Then I figured out we were-- we were sneaking in at intermission.
translation.it: Poi ho capito che stavamo entrando di nascosto durante l'intervallo.

translation.en: I don't know, I kind of preferred it that way, though.
translation.it: Ma mi è piaciuto più in quel modo.

translation.en: What's wrong?
Nothing.
What?
-Come on, tell me what's up. -I got fired, all right?
translation.it: - Forza, dimmi cos'hai. - Mi hanno licenziato, va bene?

translation.en: They called my mom. Darren just told me. It doesn't matter.
translation.it: Hanno chiamato mia madre. Darren me l'ha appena detto. Non importa.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I missed my shift, it happens. It doesn't matter.
translation.it: Ho saltato il tuo turno, capita. Non fa niente.

translation.en: Wait. Wait, wait, wait, wait. Listen.
I was thinking that when we get to the motel...
translation.it: Stavo pensando che quando saremo arrivati al motel...

translation.en: you should just wait nearby.
All right? Let me go up there alone and handle it. I got it.
translation.it: Fammi salire da sola, me la sbrigo io.

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna call my manager, all right?
translation.it: Chiamo il mio capo, va bene?

translation.en: Okay? I just wanna see what she's saying. I don't wanna...
translation.it: Ok? Voglio sentire cosa dice. Non voglio...

translation.en: Just give me a minute?
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sure.
[man] Miss, you got a Metro card?
No. I just gotta get my bag.
translation.it: No. Prendo solo la mia borsa.

translation.en: -Danny. -Hey, Mom.
You didn't bring the-- You didn't bring the fucking briefcase?
translation.it: Non hai portato la... Non hai portato la fottuta valigetta?

translation.en: Are you fucking kidding me, Danny? [punching his palm] Are you fucking kidding me?
translation.it: Mi stai prendendo per il culo, Danny? Mi stai prendendo per il culo?

translation.en: -It's fucking funny to you, man? -Yeah.
[Scott] Ellie.
-Hey! I tried to call you. I tried to-- -Yeah, yeah.
That girl...
She isn't gonna leave anybody.
Even if she thinks she is.
translation.it: Anche se lei pensa di sì...

translation.en: She isn't.
Trust me.
What did you say? Huh?
-What are you saying to me? -Fuck you.
translation.it: - Che cosa mi hai detto? - Vaffanculo.

translation.en: That's what I'm saying.
-Russell, where are we going? -I don't know. To some rich lady.
translation.it: - Russell, dove stiamo andando? - Non lo so, da una donna ricca.

translation.en: Ma! Leave it. Just leave it, okay? Leave it.
translation.it: Mamma, lascia perdere, capito? Lascia perdere!

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. -[speaking in Polish]
Ma.
[woman] Come in.
Come in. You can-- You can put that down.
Right there.
Very good.
Sit.
You wanna know the combination?
It's about the only thing these guys did that wasn't Byzantine in its complexity.
translation.it: È l'unica cosa che i ragazzi hanno fatto a non essere di una grande complessità.

translation.en: [gasps] But you know how some men are.
translation.it: Ma sai come sono alcuni uomini.

translation.en: They think the more intricate they make something, the more impressive it is.
translation.it: Pensano che più fanno una cosa complicata, più sia impressionante.

translation.en: Ah, there you are.
The one thing the lawyer said I couldn't get.
translation.it: L'unica cosa che l'avvocato ha detto che non avrei avuto.

translation.en: And I got it.
[sighs] I want to tell you something:
Never marry a man who doesn't love his mother.
translation.it: Non sposare mai un uomo che non ama sua madre.

translation.en: There's $3,000 in that envelope.
translation.it: In questa busta ci sono 3.000 dollari.

translation.en: Thank you.
You can-- You can leave.
And I'll let Jimmy know it's done so everyone else can get paid.
translation.it: E farò sapere a Jimmy che è fatta, così gli altri potranno essere pagati.

translation.en: [Russell] So where we going?
Not today. We're not open.
-[knock at door] -We're just-- We're gonna--
[Ola] Who are you?
I'm, uh...
-I'm Rebecca Vargas. -[mother] Rebecca Vargas?
-Yeah? -[mother speaking in Polish]
Yeah, we went to high school together, Ma. You don't remember?
translation.it: Mamma, eravamo al liceo insieme, non ricordi?

translation.en: Don't spend it all at the club.
Take it. And don't give it to your brother.
translation.it: Prendili. E non darli a tuo fratello.

translation.en: So where are you gonna go?
Bus to Pittsburgh.
I thought you said you were gonna leave there.
translation.it: Credevo avessi detto che volevi andartene.

translation.en: I am.
I just...
-I... -[scoffs]
-I owe it to him. -Yeah.
Right.
Just wait.
Just wait.
You know, you know, you don't...
You need a Metro card.
I-- I think I can buy one.
You can't because you only have hundreds
translation.it: Non puoi, perché hai solo pezzi da 100

translation.en: and those machines are crappy and-- and I wanna give you...
translation.it: Non puoi, perché hai solo pezzi da 100 e quelle macchinette sono difettose, quindi voglio darti...

translation.en: my Metro card.
Thanks.
...two, three, four, five.
Ma, Ma.
Sir, sir, I'll give you $100-- 100 for your card.
translation.it: Signore, le do 100 dollari per il suo abbonamento.

translation.en: Whoa. How do I know that's not counterfeit?
translation.it: Wow. Come so che non sono soldi falsi?

translation.en: It's not.
Give me a swipe, give me a swipe.
-One swipe. -One swipe.
Thanks.
Hi. When's the next bus to Pittsburgh?
translation.it: Salve, quando parte il prossimo pullman per Pittsburgh?

translation.en: Uh... 6:40 p.m. The ticket is $57.
-[woman] Miss? -Yeah, uh-- never mind, actually.
When's the next bus to Providence?
translation.it: Quando parte il prossimo pullman per Providence?

translation.en: Sorry! Sorry, sorry! Sorry.
I-- I didn't think you...
[panting] Look. Look.
I was gonna go and I-- and I just-- I just ran all the way here.
translation.it: Dovevo farlo e ho corso fino a qui.

translation.en: What's going on?
Look...
I want to go to Pittsburgh with you.
translation.it: Voglio venire a Pittsburgh con te.

translation.en: I'm not going to Pittsburgh.
Well, where you going?
Providence.
Can I come with you?
Yeah. Sure.
Wait.
-I'm sorry, okay? I shouldn't have-- -It's okay.
translation.it: - Scusami, non avrei dovuto. - Va tutto bene.

translation.en: -It's okay. -No, no, I shouldn't have done that. I shouldn't have done that. I'm sorry, I just...
translation.it: No, non avrei dovuto farlo. Non avrei dovuto farlo. Perdonami.

translation.en: -Look, I apologize, okay? -Don't be. Don't-- Don't be sorry.
translation.it: - Ti chiedo scusa, ok? - No, non scusarti.

translation.en: I just didn't...
Oh, shit.
Do you still wanna come?
Yeah, I still wanna come.
Okay, good.
And about the kiss...
it's not that I...
I just don't...
It's a start.
-Okay? -Yeah.
Yeah. I'll take a start.
Yeah, me too.
